firstNightReminder: Show the role token of a Townsfolk in play.
otherNightReminder: Show the role token of a Townsfolk in play, or signal that no remaining roles are in play.
name: Clerk
ability: Each night, you learn a new Townsfolk role that is in play, until none are left.

firstNightReminder: Show the role token of an Outsider in play.
otherNightReminder: Show the role token of a Outsider in play, or signal that no remaining roles are in play.
name: Almoner
ability: Each night, you learn a new Outsider role that is in play, until none are left.

name: Urchin
ability: (New) Once each day, you may privately ask the Storyteller if a certain player is a Minion.

otherNightReminder: If a player was executed today: Show that player's role token.
name: Undertaker
ability: Each night*, you learn which role died by execution today.

firstNightReminder: The Dreamer points to a player. Show them one good and one evil role token; one of these is correct.
otherNightReminder: The Dreamer points to a player. Show them one good and one evil role token; one of these is correct.
name: Dreamer
ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): you learn 1 good and 1 evil role, 1 of which is correct.

name: Sinner
ability: The first time you nominate, if that player is a Townsfolk, you are immediately executed.

otherNightReminder: Ask the Martyr if they want to use their ability. If so, they die, even if for some reason they could not, and no other characters can die tonight
name: Martyr
ability: At night* you may choose to protect all other players from death. If you do, you die, even if for some reason you could not.

name: Bailiff
ability: Any player you nominate cannot die until dawn, except by execution.

name: Revenant
ability: When you learn that you have died at night, publicly choose a player. If they are evil: They die.

otherNightReminder: If the Confessor was nominated yesterday: they learn the role of their nominator (but they are poisoned if that was the Demon).
name: Confessor
ability: Each night*, you learn the role of the player who nominated you yesterday. If you are nominated by the Demon, you are poisoned until dawn.

otherNightReminder: If the Sawbones has not used used their ability: The Sawbones may pick a Townsfolk role. If that role is not in play and there is a dead Good player, one of them is now alive and becomes that role.
name: Sawbones
ability: Once per game, at night*, you may pick a Townsfolk role. If that role is not in play, a dead good player is resurrected as that role (if possible).

otherNightReminder: The Bloodhound picks a role besides the Bloodhound. If there is an alive player with that role and any of their alive neighbors are evil, signal Yes; otherwise, signal No.
name: Bloodhound
ability: (New) Each night*, choose a Townsfolk role besides Bloodhound. You learn if an alive evil player has an alive neighbor with that role.

name: Sleuth
ability: Once per game during the day, you may announce that you have solved the game. You must then guess a role for each alive player. If every guess is correct, your team wins.

otherNightReminder: If the Berserker did not nominate yesterday: The may die.
name: Berserker
ability: Each night*, if you didn't nominate yesterday, you might die.

name: Lush
ability: Any Townsfolk who vote for you are drunk until dawn, even if you die.

otherNightReminder: If possible, the Muckraker points to an alive player they haven't yet chosen, and then a role. If that player is good and is not that role: the Muckraker dies.
name: Muckraker
ability: Each night*, choose an alive player you have not already chosen (if possible) and then choose a role. If they are good and are not that role: you die.

name: Drunk
ability: You do not know you are the Drunk. You think you are a Townsfolk, but your ability malfunctions.

otherNightReminder: If the Hecatomb was executed yesterday: The Demon may act again.
name: Hecatomb
ability: If you are executed, the Demon may act an additional time tonight. You may register as the Demon, even while dead. [+1 Outsider]

otherNightReminder: If no one was executed yesterday, the Executioner points at someone who was nominated yesterday: they die.
name: Executioner
ability: Each night*, if no one was executed yesterday, you may kill a player who was nominated.

firstNightReminder: The Provocateur points to one player, then another. The first player is then woken and told they are Mad about executing the second player.
otherNightReminder: The Provocateur points to one player, then another. The first player is then woken and told they are Mad about executing the second player.
name: Provocateur
ability: Each night, choose two players. The first player must be Mad about executing the second player, or may be executed. You lose this ability if there are 4 or fewer alive players.

firstNightReminder: The Chemist points to a role. That role is poisoned (if in play).
otherNightReminder: The Chemist points to a role. That role is poisoned (if in play).
name: Chemist
ability: Each night, choose a role. Any player with that role is poisoned until dusk.

otherNightReminder: Asmodeus may either point to a player, or pick three player+role combinations. In the first case, that player dies. In the second case, any correct matches die.
name: Asmodeus
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. You may instead choose up to 3 player+role combinations: any correct combinations die.

firstNightReminder: Show the Grimoire to Xanatos for as long as they need.
otherNightReminder: Show the Grimoire to Xanatos for as long as they need, who then picks a player: they die.
name: Xanatos
ability: The first night, you may look at the Grimoire. Each night*, you may look at the the Grimoire, then choose a player: they die. [-1 Outsider]

otherNightReminder: The Tsuchigumo picks a player: they die. They also pick an Outsider role: if the chosen player has that role, signal that the Tsuchigumo may pick again.
name: Tsuchigumo
ability: (New) Every night*, choose a player and an Outsider role: That player dies, and if they were that role, the Tsuchigumo may act again. [+1 Outsider]

otherNightReminder: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Then, you may choose someone who unsuccesfully nominated an evil player yesterday: they die.
name: Keziah
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Then, you may choose someone who unsuccesfully nominated an evil player yesterday: they die.

name: Apprentice
ability: On your 1st night, you gain a Townsfolk ability (if good) or a Minion ability (if evil).
